attributes.action: Change the law about kids losing a school year if they are born after September
attributes.background: I think it is unfair on kids and in parent for their kids to lose a year just because they were born after September. kids born after September till December need to join the school same as other kids that were born before September, this will take pressure of parent who want to go back to work.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. Children receive the same amount of education if they start school in the following school year, so changing the school year to January will not change the situation for all children.  

You could start a new petition calling for children to enter school throughout the school year, depending on when they were born, if that's what you'd like to see happen.
